title: Understanding Charge Carrier Dynamics in Organic Photocatalysts for Hydrogen Evolution

Hydrogen generation using particulate photocatalysts is a promising approach to achieving sustainable energy solutions to energy shortages and environmental challenges. Among them, organic semiconductor-based photocatalysts offer significant advantages, including tunable...
